mapper.select: select post_no postNo ,p.category_no cateNo ,category_name cateName ,title ,name ,to_char(p.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm') regDate ,hit from post p, category c, users u where p.category_no = c.category_no and p.user_no = u.user_no order by p.reg_date desc

select post_no postNo ,category_name cateName ,title ,name ,to_char(p.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm') regDate ,hit ,content from post p, category c, users u where p.category_no = c.category_no and p.user_no = u.user_no and post_no = #{no}
